body_html:
Hi all,

When I try to run mp.get_context('spawn') where I import torch.multiprocessing as mp I get:

AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'get_context'

I use Python 2.7 and Cuda compilation tools release 9.0, V9.0.176 .

Anyone has a solution for this?

Many thanks in advance!

body:
Hi all, 

When I try to run mp.get_context('spawn') where I import torch.multiprocessing as mp I get:

AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'get_context' 

I use Python 2.7 and Cuda compilation tools release 9.0, V9.0.176 .

Anyone has a solution for this?

Many thanks in advance!
